org.biohipi.image.io

Interface ImageEncoder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DicomCodec, JpegCodec, NiftiCodec, PngCodec, RasterCodec

    public interface ImageEncoder
    Interface for encoding a BioHipiImage in a particular storage format and writing the result to a Java OutputStream.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void encodeImage(BioHipiImage image, OutputStream outputStream)
      Encode and write image to a Java OutputStream.

    • Method Detail

      • encodeImage

        void encodeImage(BioHipiImage image,
                 OutputStream outputStream)
          throws IllegalArgumentException,
                 IOException
        Encode and write image to a Java OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        image - source image to be encoded
        outputStream - output stream that will receive encoded image
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are null or otherwise invalid
        IOException - if an error is encountered during stream serialization
